SEARCH
Package app.utilities

Class Render

java.lang.Object
app.utilities.Render
public class Render extends Object
This class contains utility methods for rendering text images our cards and the scoring zone.

  • Method Details

    • translateCard

      public static String[] translateCard(Card c)
      Translates card attributes to include text images and ANSI color codes.
      Parameters:
      c - The card to translate.
      Returns:
      A String [] containing details of the filename for the card image and the corresponding ANSI color code.

    • renderCard

      public static ArrayList<String> renderCard(Card c)
      Renders a card into a list of strings for display.
      Parameters:
      c - The card to be rendered.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of String representing the rendered card.

    • renderPlayedCard

      public static ArrayList<String> renderPlayedCard(Card c)
      Highlights the last played card in the parade for visual clarity.
      Parameters:
      c - The card to be highlighted.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of String representing the highlighted card.

    • renderStackedCards

      public static ArrayList<String> renderStackedCards(ArrayList<Card> cards)
      Renders a stacked representation of multiple cards. This is to keep things neat and prevent console width compatibility issues
      Parameters:
      cards - The list of cards to render in a stacked format.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of strings representing the stacked cards.

    • renderDeck

      public static ArrayList<String> renderDeck(int deckSize)
      Renders a deck visual based on the number of cards left.
      Parameters:
      deckSize - The number of cards left in the deck.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of strings representing the deck.

    • renderScoringZone

      public static ArrayList<CardList> renderScoringZone(ArrayList<Card> cards)
      Renders the scoring zones, seperated by color.
      Parameters:
      cards - The list of cards to render.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of type CardList, each representing a color section in the scoring zone.
